newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: RUGBY UNION-NORTHERN TRANSVAAL BEAT WAIKATO IN SUPER 12.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-NORTHERN TRANSVAAL BEAT WAIKATO IN SUPER 12.

text.p: Northern Transvaal beat Waikato of New Zealand 34-27 (halftime 17-13) in their Super 12 match at Loftus Versfeld on Saturday.
Northern Transvaal - Tries - Graeme Bouwer, Nicky van der Walt, Jacques Olivier (2), Conversions - Casper Steyn (4), Penalties - Casper Steyn (2)
Waikato - Tries - Dean Anglesey, Glen Osborne, Conversion - Matthew Cooper, Penalties - Matthew Cooper (5).
